subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Will Bynum had 25 points and 10 assists, leading another spirited performance by the Detroit bench, and the host Pistons beat the short-handed Miami Heat, 109-99.
snippet: Will Bynum had 25 points and 10 assists, leading another spirited performance by the Detroit bench, and the host Pistons beat the short-handed Miami Heat, 109-99.
